verbs.description: remarkable find when fr solanus [V: was] exhumed for relics as part of the saint - making process father solanus casey had to be exhumed and bone and tissue carefully removed from his arm when the team opened the tomb of father casey they were solanus father solanus dr werner spitz ford field solanus casey
